blocks.body:
The 2017 meeting of the curators of marine, lacustrine, and geological samples was held in Corvallis at the OSU-MGR in April 2017. Below you will find links to the meeting agenda and all the presentations from the meeting. If you have any questions please donâ€™t hesitate to contact us.

[Agenda for 2017 Curators Meeting](/Agenda-for-2017-Curators-Meeting.docx)
